content: work to turning point turn wyif sl first st p-wise bring around needle pull loop snug cont casting on sts until yarn over back of right needle pulling firmly to create a desired number is reached top yarn strand always wraps double stitch on rh needle if next st is a k st leave yarn at around bottom needle and bottom yarn strand always wraps back if next st is a p st bring yarn to front between needles around top needle a tutorial can be found at when it s time to work into double st knit both strands decrease tutorials knitpicks com/judys-magic-cast-on a video tutorial for german short row can be found at knitpicks com/video/german-short-row
